DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , non-randomised , single-dose study 6 healthy male subject . Subjects attend screen visit within 28 day drug administration . Subjects admit clinical unit morning day dose ( Day -1 ) receive single oral administration study drug fast state Day 1 . Subjects resident clinic 7 day dose ; could discharge sooner mass balance cumulative recovery > 95 % achieve , mass balance cumulative recovery > 90 % achieve < 1 % collect within 2 separate , consecutive 24 h period . At specify time study period , blood sample take urine faeces collect PK analysis . Safety assessment also perform .
DOC.brief_title: Study Healthy Male Subjects Designed Assess Mass Balance Recovery , Metabolite Profile Metabolite Identification 14C LC15-0444
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male subject age 30 65 2 . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 1835 kg/m2 3 . Must willing able communicate participate whole study 4 . Must provide write informed consent 5 . Subject must agree use adequate method contraception , study 12 week last dose investigational drug . Male subject instruct use appropriate contraception , include barrier method ( condom ) , addition precaution take partner ; 6 . Normal ( abnormal clinically significant ) supine blood pressure ( BP ) heart rate ( HR ) 7 . Good state health ( mentally physically ) indicate comprehensive clinical assessment ( detailed medical history complete physical examination ) , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) laboratory investigation ( haematology , blood chemistry urinalysis ) . 1 . Participation clinical research study involve investigational drug dosage form within previous 3 month 2 . Subjects previously enrol study 3 . History drug alcohol abuse past 2 year 4 . Regular alcohol consumption > 21 unit per week ( 1 unit = Â½ pint beer , 25 mL 40 % spirit 125 mL glass wine ) ; 5 . Subjects admit current previous use Class A drug opiates , cocaine , ecstasy , lysergic acid diethylamide ( LSD ) intravenous amphetamine ( Subjects admit occasional past use cannabis exclude long negative drug abuse test abstinent least 12 month ) 6 . Current smoker smoke within last 12 month . A breath carbon monoxide read great 10 ppm admission 7 . Radiation exposure clinical study , include present study , exclude background radiation include diagnostic Xrays medical exposure , exceed 5 mSv last twelve month 10 mSv last five year . No occupationally expose worker , define Ionising Radiation Regulations 1999 , shall participate study
